column2: tmp <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT TGT_COUNTRY, strftime('1-%m-%Y', MSNDATE) as date  FROM Bombings WHERE TGT_COUNTRY is not NULL AND TGT_COUNTRY != '' AND TGT_COUNTRY NOT LIKE '%UNKNOWN%' AND date IS NOT NULL")
tmp <- tmp %>% group_by(TGT_COUNTRY, date) %>% summarize(count = n())
g <- ggplot(tmp, aes(x = date, y = count)) +
